SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BasicTalkInterface
A simple socket interface for supporting direct messages between sockets.
Talk
Driver class for the Talk socket application.
TalkClient
A client implementation of the talk interface that prints messages from STDIN to the talk server and prints messages from the talk server on STDOUT.
TalkServer
A server implementation of the talk interface that prints messages from the talk client on STDOUT and prints messages from STDIN to the talk client.
